oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: More ceremonies performed when cutting up eland, as it is a 'magic thing'. 1) p.5363v: Dia!kwain was told this by his father (Xaa-ttin), 2) p.5365v: a note to reread (dated 13 December 1875), 3) See also Ssa ka Kumm and The Mantis and the hunting of eland, 4) This story is found in Book V-18.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Further ceremonies in cutting up eland
